title: Add regression examples exercising functor identity/compose
description: Add regression examples to demonstrate how the generic functor interface simplifies identity and compose reasoning.
intent: | Example: composing functors using the shared interface helpers. Uses the trivial one-object category, so all proofs are definitional. Identity functors on the trivial category
acceptance: All Agda modules compile without errors
Key definitions implemented: F, G, FG (+ 2 more)

evidence.text: | Example: composing functors using the shared interface helpers. Uses the trivial one-object category, so all proofs are definitional. Identity functors on the trivial category
